Louisville_Jefferson_County.National Fastpitch Coaches Association H: The National Fastpitch Coaches Association Hall of Fame was established in 1991 to recognize coaches who have made extraordinary contributions to the sport of softpitch softball. The National Fastpitch Coaches Association ("NFCA") is a professional organization for fastpitch softball coaches from all competitive levels of play. As of 2010, 53 individuals have been inducted into the NFCA Hall of Fame.
